turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I need to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to need three large pizzas total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings did you want on those 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, and one of them I want. Let's do bacon and onion and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and then one of them needs to a meat lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The last one Let's just do pepperoni for the last one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want 3 large pizzas, 1 with bacon, 1 onions and extra cheese, 1 meat lovers, 1 pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, 1 with bacon, onions and extra cheese, 1 meat lovers, 1 pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, you got it. Absolutely and can I get all thick crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me add that in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, 1 with bacon, onions and extra cheese, 1 meat lovers, 1 pepperoni and all with thick crust. the total will be $48.92.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I've placed your order at Bella Lunas and it should be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nice and how much was that again?
